column5: Our trip to the Gouin has been canceled so we are making a run up to Cabonga. I was wondering if anyone had info on how the fishing is there? My uncle used to go there years ago but heard rumors that the Indians had gill-netted most of the fish. I would appreciate any info on the fishing or on Deerhorn Lodge itself. Thanks,Josh
Josh, Don't worry. If there's any Dore' left in Cabonga,we'll find 'em. Gotta be some there. Too bad about the Gouin trip. We'll get 'em next year. Scotty
I'll bring some extra cigars, just in case. Josh
josh you will be pleased alot of 4,5,6 lb. dore. and some 7,,8,9,10s, Have a good time deerhorn everyone that works there. will treat you great!!
